channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Now located in Front Garden of 20 Buckley Road, 17th November
item.description:
I found a dead fox on the street last night - it had been hit by a car. I put it in some bin bags and it is in my front garden. Please can you come collect asap.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Buckley Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Half a JOB, 17th November
item.description:
What a joke this work has been over the summer. Half a job done again by whoever. What was the point of this work/upgrade. Half a job, path unfinished, crap left on the sides, litter everywhere under the bridge and on the steps and path leading up to the road, uneven paths, trip hazards. When will this get finished?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pettman Crescent, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish placed in front of fire door, 17th November
item.description:
Everyday rubbish is placed outside the external fire exit door for the Travelodge London Hackney Hotel. It was reported in the past, but the problem still persists. Not only is it unsightly it poses a major health and safety risks to the guests and staff.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
